# The General APIs Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Functions in this section work on all <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> instances, regardless of their sub-type. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Functions in this section work on all <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> instances, regardless of their sub-type.

They correspond to functions available on <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">llvm::Value</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Defines

### LLVM&#95;DECLARE&#95;VALUE&#95;CAST {#gac2f94c6e6c7bae2cc72325cc74413d41}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>#define LLVM&#95;DECLARE&#95;VALUE&#95;CAST&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;  <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> LLVMIsA##<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/smeabipass-cpp/#a8f8f80d37794cde9472343e4487ba3eb">name</a>(<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> Val);</>}>
Convert value instances between types.

Internally, an <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> is &quot;pinned&quot; to a specific type. This series of functions allows you to cast an instance to a specific type.

If the cast is not valid for the specified type, NULL is returned.


<SectionUser title="See Also">
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5f6182886dc2f96c204299e92c1565d5">llvm::dyn&#95;cast&#95;or&#95;null&lt;&gt;</a>
</SectionUser>
